title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 481 - Program Fees: In General
content:

§ 481.1 - Program fees
§ 481.2 - Who must pay
§ 481.3 - When fees must be paid
§ 481.4 - How much must be paid

§ 481.6 - Interest assessment for nonpayment

§ 481.8 - Suspension, revocation and nonrenewal of permits for nonpayment

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 481

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 3-0301, 72- 0201, 72-0303[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
